  • Classes in gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator used by gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator 
    Class and Description
    AllUsers
    This class integrates the set of users associated with a data center directly to the data center.
    Datacenter
    The data center is a resource for distributed storing systems such as cloud storages which integrates several storing nodes.
    Datacenter.Router
    The routers do the routing in the data centers.
    DatacentersTopology.State 
    Dataitem
    Data units are created by the users and are stored in the nodes.
    DataitemInfo
    It saves all the data information which needs to be stored.
    GeographicalZone
    System divided to multiple regions.
    Request
    Users employ this object for accessing the data and operating on them.
    RequestType
    This enum use for determine type of request.
    User
    This is a user which is identified by an ID.
